client_description_Summary_Note:
Lena Corinne Wyss and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Zürich. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Lena Corinne Wyss is a 21 year old and comes from Switzerland.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
client_description_Family_Background: Lena Corinne Wyss is currently single. She does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background: In 2023, Lena finished her secondary school education at École secondaire de Morges Vaud.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Lena Corinne Wyss is a 21 year old and comes from Switzerland.
Lena Corinne Wyss did not start her professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
She did not save any money from her earnings.
Client does not have any properties.In 2015, she received an inheritance of 980000 CHF from her late grandmother, who was a prominent Investment Banker, and has since invested it in various assets.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is looking forward to supporting the client in building a successful career and achieving financial stability.
